gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `PropertyPlantEquipment` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `PropertyPlantEquipment` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice` MOET NIET gerapporteerd worden, omdat `PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice` gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice` MOET NIET gerapporteerd worden, omdat `PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice` gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_PropertyPlantEquipment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_PropertyPlantEquipment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
